name: Summoner
firstNightReminder: Show the THESE CHARACTERS ARE NOT IN PLAY token. Show 3 not-in-play good character tokens.
otherNightReminder: Change the Summoner reminder token to the relevant night. If it is night 3, the Summoner chooses a player and a Demon. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the YOU ARE token, a thumbs down and the chosen Demon token.
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
flavor: "Hail the guardians of the north; by my intellect, thou art cut. Hail the guardians of the east; by my will, thou art dominated. Hail the guardians of the south; by that which lies beyond, the mystery is revealed. Hail the guardians of the west; a shield in the darkness"

jinxes.reason: The Alchemist-Summoner does not get bluffs, and chooses which Demon but not which player. If they die before this happens, evil wins. [No Demon]
If there would be a Marionette in play, they enter play after the Demon & must start as their neighbor.
The Summoner registers as the Demon to the Clockmaker.
If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
If the living Summoner is removed from play, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
If the living Summoner has no ability, the Storyteller has the Summoner ability.
If the Poppy Grower is alive on the 3rd night, the Summoner chooses which Demon but not which player.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
The Summoner may summon a Pukka on the 2nd night instead of the 3rd.
If the Summoner creates a second living Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
If the Summoner summons a dead player into the Zombuul, the Zombuul has already "died once".
If a Lord of Typhon is summoned, they must neighbor a Minion & their other neighbor becomes an evil Minion.
If Legion is summoned, all evil players become Legion.
